text:
Conrad Macao to host ‘PINK Inspired 2015’ Charity Lunch
Conrad Macao, Cotai Central will host a PINK Inspired charity lunch on Thursday 15 th October, 2015 as part of the hotel’s PINK campaign which is held throughout October to raise funds for the Hong Kong Cancer Fund’s PINK Revolution campaign. The lunch will be held in partnership with the International Ladies Club of Macao and tickets are MOP480 per person. Guests attending the lunch have the opportunity to win amazing raffle prizes including luxury international hotel getaways and exclusive offers from retailers at Sands Shoppes. Total value of all the raffle prizes is more than MOP120,000. In addition each guest will also receive a gift bag valued at MOP3,000 which includes special offers and shopping vouchers from Ralph Lauren, Sabon Body & Bath, Wolford, Shanghai Tang, Bodhi Spa, ARTĒ Madrid, iiJin tote bag, Macau Tatler magazine and a limited edition silver elephant bottle opener with pink ribbon from Georg Jenson jewellers. Emcee for the lunch will be Hong Kong TV personality Mr. Sean Lee Davis.
“This is the second year that the hotel has hosted this luncheon event and the support for this year’s event has been overwhelming”, said Bede Barry, general manager.
“It is great to see many of our retail partners from Sands Shoppes and other Conrad hotels around the world come together to support this very worthy campaign by donating such wonderful prizes.”
Guest speaker at the luncheon will be Ms. Zita Ong, CEO of Edipresse, Media Asia, a luxury lifestyle media and events company. Since joining in 2011, Zita has been instrumental in growing the company from a traditional print publisher to a dynamic multi-platform content provider, encompassing digital, custom publishing, content marketing and live events. Headquartered in Hong Kong, the company counts among its growing portfolio one of the region’s most influential luxury lifestyle media brands, Asia Tatler. Prior to joining Edipresse, Zita held senior positions in ACP magazines Asia and Mediacorp Publishing, where she oversaw numerous magazine and website launches including Harper´s Bazaar and Cosmopolitan in South East Asia, and managed various custom publishing and distribution businesses.
The lunch will include a three-course pink themed menu and two glasses of sparkling wine for MOP480 per person which also includes a MOP100 donation to the charity. Guests will also be able to buy raffle tickets to be in the lucky draw to win one of the following prizes ( total value of more than MOP120,000 ):
Pink sapphire necklace with white diamonds from Butani Jewelers valued at MOP 8,000 Exclusive limited edition Notte Intima Wirebag from Anteprima valued at HKD7,190 Limited edition 2015 Shanghai Tang PINK bracelet Exclusive limited edition PINK scarf designed by Diane von Furstenberg Furla Pink bag Two nights’ stay at Rome Cavalieri Waldorf Astoria Two nights’ stay at Conrad New York Two nights’s stay at Conrad London St. James Two nights’ stay at Conrad Beijing Three nights’ stay at Conrad Maldives Three nights’ stay at Conrad Singapore Two prizes, each receive four Venetian Macao Open VIP passes and invitations for the golf clinic 90–minutes signature massage at Bodhi Spa Dinner for two at Morton’s Steakhouse Afternoon tea for two at Conrad Macao Lobby Lounge Dinner for two at Dynasty 8 4 first class round-trip ferry tickets on Cotai Water Jet Limited edition sequin sneakers from iiJin valued at MOP2,950 Sabon Luxury Body and Bath Hamper valued at MOP1,615 Rockport shopping voucher valued at MOP1,500 Ten Travel Gift sets valued at MOP3,000 which includes MOP2,000 store voucher to shop at T Galleria DFS
